original_text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous, but grievous: nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby.
korean_text: 무릇 징계가 당시에는 즐거워 보이지 않고 슬퍼 보이나 후에 그로 말미암아 연단 받은 자들은 의와 평강의 열매를 맺느니라

sentences.original_text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 어떤 징계도 당장에는 기쁜 것 같지 않고

sentences.original_text: it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness
unto them which are exercised thereby
